nodes.text: Merokia was a desert planet located in the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories near the Unknown Regions. It was inhabited during the era of the New Republic. Merokia was the homeworld of the Force-sensitive human Karr Nuq Sin.

Merokia first appeared in the 2019 junior novel Force Collector written by Kevin Shinick. The planet was named after Meroke, a name for the Native American people indigenous to the area that became Shinick's hometown of Merrick, New York and the town's namesake.
